messages.title: Three reasons to back Ruth Coleman
messages.content:
1. Ruth and the Lib Dems will get the economy right with our costed plans to reduce the deficit and cut tax for low and middle income earners.
2. Ruth will put the people of Leeds West first in parliament.
3. Ruth and the Lib Dems will sweep away the rotten political system and create a fair society where people come first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Costed plans to reduce the deficit and cut tax for low and middle income earners.
Sweep away the rotten political system and create a fair society.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Tories can't win in Leeds West

issues.economy: Costed plans to reduce the deficit and cut tax for low and middle income earners.
issues.governance: Sweep away the rotten political system and create a fair society where people come first.
